segments.text: I feel both amused and worried watching the woman continue her mundane task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus on that plate is admirable, yet it’s almost oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like she’s in a bubble, while the world around her threatens to burst.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children’s antics make me laugh, but there’s tension in the air.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a contrast – the chaos inside and the calm garden outside the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she even hears the water spilling over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout a warning, yet part of me wants to see what unfolds.
segments.speaker: PAR
